question: Which of the following has launched India's first commodity options in gold?
explanation: The Multi-Commodity Exchange of India Ltd (MCX) has launched India's first commodity options in gold and gave stakeholders a new set of financial instruments to hedge their price risks. It is launched by Union Finance Minister Arun Jaitley in New Delhi on October 17, 2017. MCX has currently launched a Gold Option contract, with Gold (1 Kg) futures as the underlying asset, with expiry on November 28, 2017 and January 29, 2018.
